author: Jaime
content: Amazon workers going on strike for black Friday,  wonder if this will affect sales....

author: Ryan
content: Why is amzn stock performance so disconnected from how the actual company is performing? Don’t understand the effort by market makers to hold it back or prevent it from moving up, which seems like what is happening. I’m ignorant to this mostly but almost seems like there is genuine hate for amzn from powerful people who influence this…. Someone enlighten me.

author: Rob
content: Bullish: Kathy Woods buys more Amazon, Amazon awarded a new military contract and a major shoe store contract for Prime.

content: Time to short this puppy. Look at the charts
